content:
Sure, here are some example tooltip descriptions for the "itinerary planning" feature:

1. "Create and manage a personalized itinerary for your visit to Shanghai Disney Resort!"
2. "Maximize your family's enjoyment of the park and minimize wait times with a custom itinerary."
3. "Get personalized recommendations for attractions, dining, and more based on your interests and preferences."
4. "Adjust your itinerary on-the-go with real-time data and recommendations from the app."
5. "Easily share your itinerary with family and friends to make planning a breeze."
